content.raw: Okay, I think meshes are fine. The problem is with `<include><uri>` tags because the included file has to be found by the parser when calling `Root::Load` before DOM objects are created. We might have to pass in the `FilePath` as a second argument to the `findFile` callback. Addressing this seems to be out of scope for this PR so I'll go ahead and approve.
